content.text:
# Draft:Playable Nations in War Games (Video Games)

The purpose of this article is list all computer and console video games, along with the various nations which are either represented or are playable. This article is only for video games that depict either historical conflicts and nations, or are based in the real world and represent plausibly accurate conflicts and nations.
Some of the most long running and popular video game series will be noted individually below.
